entities.description: Data that is not recorded or is unavailable in the dataset.
An individual who has been arrested and is the subject of the variable being measured.
The type of weapon the arrestee was armed with, which includes unarmed, various types of firearms, cutting instruments, and other weapons.
The total number of valid and processed cases in the dataset.

relationships.description: Indicates the portion of the survey where data is missing or unrecorded.
Describes the type of weapon an arrestee was armed with.
Indicates that a specific case is part of the total number of cases recorded in the dataset.
